attributes.action: Congestion Charge PCN - STOP THE UNFAIR FINES
attributes.additional_details:
1) If a motorist has not paid their Congestion Charge - Send them a reminder with payment details.

2) Update the lacking signage to include the payment terms (by the next day) to ensure motorists have fair warning to pay before receiving fines.

3) Make it clear on the HOME page of the congestion charging website that payment must be made beforehand or by the following day.

4) Allow a fair amount of time to pay the congestion charge, after receiving a reminder / invoice.
